questions.question_text: What are two challenges of using a network-based IPS? (Choose two.)

questions.answer: E. Create a whitelist that contains the URLs you want to allow and activate the whitelist on the perimeter router

choices.A: Enable URL filtering on the perimeter firewall and add the URLs you want to allow to the routers local URL list
choices.B: Enable URL filtering on the perimeter router and add the URLs you want to allow to the firewalls local URL list
choices.D: Enable URL filtering on the perimeter router and add the URLs you want to block to the routers local URL list
choices.C: Create a blacklist that contains the URL you want to block and activate the blacklist on the perimeter router

discussion.content: Enable URL filtering on the perimeter router and add the URLs you want to block to the routers local URL list

questions.answer_ET: D. A VLAN hopping attack would be prevented

choices.B: A VLAN hopping attack would be successful
choices.A: the attack VLAN will be pruned
choices.C: The trunk port would go into an error-disable state
